name: uselessness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of being of no use, or of not working or achieving what is needed: They complained bitterly about the uselessness of their training. She knew the complete uselessness of arguing with him any longer.
mainlyUK informal the quality of not being at all good at doing something: He is known as Mr Wrong for the uselessness of his predictions. She tells bad jokes about the uselessness of men. See
useless
More examplesFewer examplesHe warns about the uselessness of many university degrees.I realized the uselessness of the situation.He has deserved our contempt for his profound stupidity, and his utter uselessness at all the tasks.
